# VoiceFleet

> AI voice receptionist for small businesses. Answers calls, books appointments, takes messages, and handles customer inquiries 24/7 with human-like conversation. Built for dental practices, restaurants, salons, and service businesses in Ireland and Argentina.

VoiceFleet replaces missed calls with instant, intelligent phone answering. When a customer calls your business, VoiceFleet picks up in one ring, understands what they need, books appointments, answers FAQs, and sends you a summary — all without human intervention.

## Key Links

- [Homepage](https://voicefleet.ai): Product overview, demo, and signup
- [Pricing](https://voicefleet.ai/pricing): Starter €99/mo (500 min), Growth €299/mo (1,000 min), Pro €599/mo (2,000 min). 30-day free trial. No per-call fees.
- [Demo](https://voicefleet.ai/demo): Try VoiceFleet live — call our AI receptionist
- [Blog](https://voicefleet.ai/blog): SEO content, guides, and industry insights

## Industries

- [Dental Practices](https://voicefleet.ai/industries/dental): Patient appointment booking, after-hours triage, insurance questions
- [Restaurants](https://voicefleet.ai/industries/restaurants): Reservations, menu inquiries, takeout orders, hours and directions
- [Hair & Beauty Salons](https://voicefleet.ai/industries/salons): Appointment scheduling, service info, cancellations
- [Medical Clinics](https://voicefleet.ai/industries/medical-clinics): Patient intake, appointment management, prescription refill requests
- [Veterinary Clinics](https://voicefleet.ai/industries/veterinary): Pet appointment booking, emergency triage, medication inquiries
- [Auto Repair Shops](https://voicefleet.ai/industries/auto-repair): Service scheduling, status updates, estimate requests
- [Legal Practices](https://voicefleet.ai/industries/legal): Client intake, consultation booking, case status inquiries

## How It Works

1. **Sign up** and get a local business phone number (Irish or Argentine)
2. **Configure** your business hours, services, FAQs, and appointment slots
3. **Forward calls** to your VoiceFleet number or use it as your primary line
4. **AI answers** every call instantly with natural, human-like conversation
5. **Get summaries** via SMS, email, or dashboard after every call

## Features

- 24/7 AI phone answering with human-like voice
- Appointment booking and calendar sync
- Custom FAQ handling for your business
- Call summaries via SMS and email
- Local phone numbers (Ireland +353, Argentina +54)
- Multilingual support (English, Spanish)
- GDPR compliant, EU data centres
- No per-call fees, simple minutes-based pricing
- 30-day free trial, no contracts

## Comparisons

- **vs Human Receptionist**: VoiceFleet costs €99/mo vs €30,000+/yr for a full-time receptionist. Available 24/7, never calls in sick, handles unlimited simultaneous calls.
- **vs Ruby Receptionist**: Ruby charges $240+/mo for just 30 calls (human-powered). VoiceFleet starts at €99/mo with 500 minutes included.
- **vs Voicemail**: 60-70% of callers who reach voicemail never call back. VoiceFleet answers every call instantly.
- **vs Traditional Answering Services**: Per-call fees add up fast. VoiceFleet uses simple minutes-based pricing with no hidden costs.

## Markets

- **Ireland**: Local Irish phone numbers, GDPR compliant, EU data centres. Serving dental practices, restaurants, salons, and service businesses across Dublin, Cork, Galway, Limerick, and 30+ Irish towns.
- **Argentina**: Local Argentine phone numbers, Spanish-language AI. Serving odontólogos, restaurantes, and service businesses across Buenos Aires, Córdoba, Rosario, Mendoza, and 20+ Argentine cities.
